author: ejcmoorhouse
title: Steana Line Ferry
review: i remeber the year i got this, on the summer holidays that year we had been over from scotland to ireland for a day on this ferry. i was really pleased when i ran downstairs at christmas and found this waiting from stana. later i asked one of my family to make it for me and when they asked what sitckers i wanted i asked for Link stickers which i don't like. what is good about this set is that not just has it a boat but it also has a car, you can do it up as a different ferry and it even has the engines inside.
